ComicInfo.Title: The Wizard's Venom; i hunger... and i wait.; On the Shoals of Space; And Sleep the Long Night In Peace!; High Priestess of Sexual Fantasy; Wooden Ships on the Water
ComicInfo.Summary:
The great science fiction/fantasy anthology series continues with a litany of stellar comics creators.
1) Editorial: Friedrich (1 page text article)
2) Dragonus: The Wizard’s Venom: Brunner (10 pages)
3) I Hunger And I Wait…: Mark A. Worden, Mark Cohen (5 page illustrated poem)
4) Earthprobe: On The Shoals Of Space: Warwick, Marrs (12 pages)
5) And Sleep The Long Night In Peace!: Warwick, Smith, Workman (7 pages)
6) Linda Lovecraft: High Priestess Of Sexual Fantasy: Vosburg (9 pages)
7) Wooden Ships On The Water: Friedrich, Leialoha (5 pages adapted from the song by David Crosby, Steven Stills & Paul Kantner)
*The Dragonus story is a direct sequel to Dragonus which was first published in Phase #1 (1971). Linda Lovecraft is an early take on Vosberg's more recent Lori Lovecraft series.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-16 10:13:03. [CVDB15610]
ComicInfo.Writer: Frank Brunner, Mark Worden, Mal Warwick, Mike Vosburg, Mike Friedrich
ComicInfo.Penciller: Frank Brunner, Mark Cohen, Mal Warwick, Lee Marrs, John Workman, Bob Smith, Mike Vosburg, Steve Leialoha, Bob Smith, Frank Brunner, John Workman, Lee Marrs, Mike Vosburg, Steve Leialoha
ComicInfo.Inker: Frank Brunner, Mark Cohen, Lee Marrs, John Workman, Bob Smith, Mike Vosburg, Steve Leialoha, Bob Smith, John Workman, Lee Marrs, Mike Vosburg, Steve Leialoha
ComicInfo.Letterer: Tom Orzechowski, Mark Cohen, John Workman, Mike Vosburg
